content: to graft both sides together graft 19 stitches when you get to the end you will have a gap between the now-grafted part and the back you will have to graft that back piece to what is essentially the side of the combover piece so the seam goes across the back of the wig cut yarn and fasten_off weave in ends and you re done glossary single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet fp = front post bp = back post fpdc = double_crochet in front post front post double_crochet bpdc = double_crochet in back post back post double_crochet fptc = tc in front post front post triple/treble bptc = tc in back post back post triple/treble triple decrease double_crochet = yo work first part of double_crochet in double_crochet leave last 2 loops on hook the next stitch will be a 3 fptc decrease so yo twice work the first 2 steps in a bptc go around all 3 posts yo once work the first part of a double_crochet in the next double_crochet yo pull yarn through all 4 loops on hook 3 fptc decrease = yo twice work first 2 parts of fptc leaving the last 2 loops on hook repeat for the next 2 posts you will have 4 loops on hook yo and pull yarn through all 4 loops to finish
